sub_fields.label: Button URL
sub_fields.name: button_url

sub_fields.label: Reverse
sub_fields.name: reverse
sub_fields.instructions: Two column sections start with image -> text, and the order alternates. Checking reverse starts the first row with text -> image.

sub_fields.label: Media
sub_fields.name: media
sub_fields.instructions: Flexible content area for either an image, gallery carousel or video.
